name: PaperCut (4rtemys)
description:
Like a gift from heaven, it would seem that you have fallen into my webs. It's not like you have anywhere else to go. I can feel your every movement as you dance along the corridors of my real. As the hostess of this domain, allow me to show you around and welcome you with open arms, my many, many, arms. My realm comprises of:
  • A 2.5D platformer involving combat and timed combat
  • A map with multiple rooms all wrapped in a carefully crafted paper art style
  • Upgradable abilities
  • Spiders of all types, ready to serve...me

You should be able to move smoothly and intuitively, dash, slash and grow stronger and tastier until you can reach me. I made sure that you were not to be harmed until you woke. Upon your death, you need not worry, I will stitch you back together in no time. I can't wait to meat you...

Controls: Keyboard and Mouse

Jump & Double Jump - Space bar

Left & right movement - A and D

Detach from walls - S

Dash - L Shift

Attack - LMB

Grappling Hook - RMB

Interact - E

Pause Game - Escape

Credits: My world:
